properties.name: Tag
properties.description: A tag assigned to the content control. The same tag can be assigned to several content controls so that it is possible to make reference to them in your code.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: A unique identifier of the content control. It can be used to search for a certain content control and make reference to it in the code.

properties.name: Lock
properties.description: A value that defines if it is possible to delete and/or edit the content control or not: 0 - only deleting, 1 - no deleting or editing, 2 - only editing, 3 - full access.

properties.name: InternalId
properties.description: A unique internal identifier of the content control. It is used for all operations with content controls.

ContentControlLock.name: ContentControlLock
ContentControlLock.description:
A value that defines if it is possible to delete and/or edit the content control or not.

0 - only deleting 1 - disable deleting or editing 2 - only editing 3 - full access

ContentControlType.name: ContentControlType
ContentControlType.description: A numeric value that specifies the content control type.

properties.name: type
properties.description: 1 - block content control, 2 - inline content control, 3 - row content control, 4 - cell content control

properties.name: ContentControlProperties
properties.description: The content control properties (ID, Tag, Lock, Alias, Appearance, Color).

properties.name: Script
properties.description: A script that will be executed to generate the data within the content control.

properties.name: Url
properties.description: A link to the shared file.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: A unique identifier of the content control. It can be used to search for a certain content control and make reference to it in the code.

properties.name: Tag
properties.description: A tag assigned to the content control. The same tag can be assigned to several content controls so that it is possible to make reference to them in your code.

properties.name: Lock
properties.description: A value that defines if it is possible to delete and/or edit the content control or not: 0 - only deleting, 1 - no deleting or editing, 2 - only editing, 3 - full access.

properties.name: Alias
properties.description: The alias attribute.

properties.name: Appearance
properties.description: Defines if the content control is shown as the bounding box (1) or not (2).

properties.name: Color
properties.description: The color for the current content control in the RGB format.

properties.name: Color.R
properties.description: Red color component value.

properties.name: Color.G
properties.description: Green color component value.

properties.name: Color.B
properties.description: Blue color component value.

properties.name: Data
properties.description: OLE object data (internal format).

properties.name: ImageData
properties.description: An image in the base64 format stored in the OLE object and used by the plugin.

properties.name: ApplicationId
properties.description: An identifier of the plugin which can edit the current OLE object and must be of the asc.{UUID} type.

properties.name: InternalId
properties.description: The OLE object identifier which is used to work with OLE object added to the document.

properties.name: ParaDrawingId
properties.description: An identifier of the drawing object containing the current OLE object.

properties.name: Width
properties.description: The OLE object width measured in millimeters.

properties.name: Height
properties.description: The OLE object height measured in millimeters.

properties.name: WidthPix
properties.description: The OLE object image width in pixels.

properties.name: HeightPix
properties.description: The OLE object image height in pixels.
